description: see http://hl7.org/fhir/json.html#schema for information about the FHIR Json Schemas

allOf.description: Financial instrument which may be used to pay for or reimburse health care products and services.

status.description: The status of the resource instance.

issuer.description: The program or plan underwriter or payor including both insurance and non-insurance agreements, such as patient-pay agreements.

isAgreement.description: A self, or other, payment agreement not an insurance policy.

period.description: Time period during which the coverage is in force. A missing start date indicates the start date isn't known, a missing end date means the coverage is continuing to be in force.

type.description: The type of coverage: social program, medical plan, accident coverage (workers compensation, auto), group health.

planholder.description: The party who 'owns' the insurance contractual relationship to the policy or to whom the benefit of the policy is due.

beneficiary.description: The party who benefits from the insurance coverage.

relationship.description: The relationship of beneficiary (patient) (subscriber) to the the planholder.

identifier.description: The main (and possibly only) identifier for the coverage - often referred to as a Member Id, Subscriber Id, Certificate number or Personal Health Number or Case ID.

level.description: A suite of underwrite specific classifiers, for example may be used to identify a class of coverage or employer group, Policy, Plan.

dependent.description: A unique identifier for a dependent under the coverage.

sequence.description: An optional counter for a particular instance of the identified coverage which increments upon each renewal.

network.description: The identifier for a community of providers.

contract.description: The policy(s) which constitute this insurance coverage.
